entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Dryden
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:54 AM CST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Sunny, -24.2°C

entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 19.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 19. Wind chill minus 33 this morning and minus 25 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM CST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 31.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 31. Wind chill minus 27 this evening and minus 39 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM CST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Increasing cloudiness. High minus 18.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness late in the morning. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h near noon. High minus 18. Wind chill minus 40 in the morning and minus 22 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM CST Tuesday 31 January 2023
